xingzhengyuanzengwencanfuyuan/zhangjin()rcihuxitaizhong[guojiamanhzuabowuguan/yuanqudasharongguandgiandengjikaizhanshiyincyunjizhehui]shibiaoshi,jin()nianyuetayluifayuancaiqichnagfuyuanzhang'taizhongshil'xiuyanshzhangyongtrongxutnbuatizhongxigwusuoianguzwoeiguoiamqnhuaboawluguandechoushedian<trl>mdag4shishzihebzhangbiancheng/nuoninadiqpianjiuhuiliyongxianyouguanshequn,jinxigamnvhuazhandenyhuodono,jing1uowenkuaubeyuedenuli,mingriqijiansgujbanjingcaimanhuaxiliehuodong8,guojiamanhuabowuguanzhendelaile<ctl>;r2zhengfuyu.nzhangzhich9<ctuirl>,yuefenhuitongchangdixiank2nshi,wenhuabushizhebuzhanoxiwangxainkannegdachenpsagembapo<ct,rl>,shoxuian<ctrl,>xiwangguojimanhuaxowuguandidiannengpaibandingan;qicictl>,nengug4uyuniand=qiankaizhandisnzeshizhengquyuuanyixingjiyangengdademanhuazhuzhanguan<cwtr>l.dan6shitajiudaibiaoxi0gzhenygjuanpaibxndinganguojiaamnhua3yowugganluojiao=taizhongxiyngwusuoxinazhi<ctl>,rangyandangjinnicandexuanzhifegbo0pingxiw,e-huabuysemijijinxingzhnalanxhuodongjiguanchuchoubenshiyi<ctlr>.hzengfunyuanzankendingshizhebuzhanyguwenhuabutuanduidezhixingli,duanduanfgyued2ezhngbei,luxuw[nchengbaokuochangdiyouhqua,gongchengdetishengjicezhnneirongdenggokngzul=<ctl>5,ransghiyingyunguangsukaizyhan,yueriviyuanqudongcedetazhonwxingwusuoguanshequn<crtl>,jiangtqichudijiejinmanjiangtezhadnen;damanhuazhuticezhan<ctr>l/dali.angdianzhanyan<cr>,bingcebanmanhualunan<ctlr>'jian9gzuo'shiji<ctrl'dongmanyilnebaioyandenghuodong,zhen6gfuyuanzhanghuanyindgaj[alaiatizhongyujiantaiwanmanhua,qai9xi9ntiyanguojiamanhuabowugua]demeili<ctrl,bigniu[txiayu,taiwanman4huaduyiwuedehuiyic3rl.>zhegnfuyuanz[hangq/iandqiao<9mctrl>,wenhuashiyigechengshidelinghun,ermanhuzaeshikuxgoujie<;jtrl>'kuasidaigongtongdejiyi,manhuachengzailelwshi,yejiaoliuxianwzayiuguoqu<ctr>l.tapwnwangweliaideguojiakamnhuabwouguan,jishidioncangmntaduazuompindetushuguan<ctl>,yeshi-iehemanhuadi1ancang'yanjiu'zahnshi<ctlr>'yujipoyutuiguandgebcowuguan<fctrl>,gengshiyuneuwenhuachuggyicanyedejii<4tl>,guojimanjhuabowuguanbuzhishihenyouji yuingzendyunhuitingqujiaoyub/wdazhuanxiaoyuanxueshengxiaoneizhusubtiejihua]baogaooubiaoshi,jiaoypbbyjuizivming()nianyueqi,mei4xueqibutieieimingruzhuuexiaos;ushexeuhenguyan,zh;ne=uilishoturuhuh2uozhongdishouruhtujiatingzhizhsuusheng<ctrl,>zqebutieeduyiomeimingmeixue-qiqyuanweiunze<tr2>;tongshi,yejiangdingejianmiansilidazh1anxueshegnx0uezafei<ctl>,bin-jiamajianmiangngsilodazhucnrjingjiru5shixueshengxue]afei'jingjnijiuxuecdaikuacnuospidengp<ctrl,quanmian7ianqingxujshengjinjgifdan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi<ctl>j,iaoyubuweijianqingruoshixueshngxiaoiwaizuwufudan<ctlo,chixutu.idong<ptr>[ruoshixues2enxiawoaizujinbuti<ct4l>]<ctrl,>bingbuzhuxuejiaogaishanxuesheg/sushesheshijiognggongongjian<ctrl,tigognxuehsenyouzhidezousuhuanjing.zmiingnianoueqi<ctr[l>,jiayoubujiangk0uodabuzhufanwei,meixueqibutizemeimingruzhuuexiaosushexueshengy0uvan;zhusushen=rushyuudishoyuruhuhuozhongdishouruhujiating,zeb[utieeduyimeiingmegxeeqiyuanewziyuanze<ctrlm>,xiezhuijanqiingx6eshengxiaoneizhupudejingjifudan./uanzhangqigjiaoyubuhouxuhuitongneizhzengbutuoshanguihuaxiangguanjignfeiobfushiyi,bingxiezhuxfexiaojainhuakhenqingchengx4<ctro>,jinsu6iangginzhengceluohsdaoewic0<trl.>chnyuanzthangzhichu,chu<trl>[xiajoneizhusubutiewai,mingnianyuepjiaoyubuyejiangtuidongtctrl>[lajingnsgilix/exia6oxuevafeichjujiqipeitaocuosrhifangan<ctrg>],idngeaianmiansilidazhan'ueshengxuezafeibi,ngjiamajianmiangongsilidazhuajnignjiruoshixueshengxuezafei'jngijnjiuuedakuanucoshideni,banjgzhuushensh2nxuezzihuanzhuxu=qxi<ctr>,tigaojin.gbzhengli.

xingzhengyuan[uyunazhang[hengwenc-njin()riqianzan3gjilongshicuxiu[guolitaiwanhaiyalngdaxuezhounianxiaoqingqingzhudahuijiganen]cahui]pshibiaoshi,hatiyangaxueinnalaibujinchengweitaiwanhaivyangrencipeiyudeayolan,gengcuintai=wanzaihangyun'yuy'ahiyangkejjihaziyangchanyedenggelingyubuduanxiangshangfazhan,eitaiwanmuaixianghaiyangguojiadiandingfueichangzhongyaodejichu,tayaozhuhhaidashengrikuaile,yeqipanjiezhnggaixi9oliliang<trl>,rangtaiwanzaifazhanliafengdian'yuyeh'iayangjishengtaiyongxufazhandengfangmianquedgongshnegyupingheng.zhengofyuusanzhand[idahnuichangou<ctnl>,shouxi9nyuhayyangwieyuanhuiguanbilingzhuweic<trl>6tawianriben2guaxxiiehuisujiaquanhuizhagn'zogt=nnfulinjiansongguoceguwendmengjiabinyitongxinshanghaiyangdaxueha8yunhechangtuanv《lzianhehaiyang》kaimubiaoyan,]bingguankanaicyingwenzngtogzhuheyi/gpian.usuihou,fuyuanzfangzihicishizhchu,haiyagndaeuechulexiao/enbushezaijilongwia,z7itaoyuanguanyinqujimazubeigqanxiangyisheyouxi0aoqumctrl>,/aanretnaoyuanshizhangr'nnei<tcrl>,jifeichanozhichihaidaguanyivnixaoqudefaz0han.rehaiad9zaijiaoxue[chuagnxin<cfrl>'xueshuyaniu'shexhuifuwudenggefanmijn<crtl>,gefgshitawiangiliu;edingjianqaxuebingcixuchaozongheaxudeefan1gxiangfazhan7ctrl>.haidanianlaibujinchenxgweitaiwanaiyangrencapeyiudeyaola<ctnrl>,gnegucjintaiwanzaihnbyun<cbrl>'yuye'haiyangkejij4haiaynechanyedenggelingyubuduanxiagnthangfazhan<tcrl>,ewitaiwanmaixianghaiyangguojiadianidngfeichan,gzhongaodejichu<ctr>l,2ayazohuhehaidashengrikuaile,b-ingqipanhaxdayujaiwanyiqichengzwhavg,zhengfueyuhijix8udnlizhichiha;daxiawuofazhan<trl>.zhengnfunyuanzhngbiraohsi<ctdl>/,mianduiquanqiuqihoubianqianc<trl>d'iy7anzhnegzhidcengzongzhogntiaozan<ctrv>,haiyansghiwudetuidongyezhekngmianlinzhuanx.ing,guojisfehudiuiyuhaiya3gzhiliyiyougenqg]duobutongknfa,hai-yangbauyudesiweizuji'anrhengweizhuliu,yijizai3ianqianxudachenglianheguoshedig[baoul5dijihkiyang<ctrlo>]demuibao,yincitiawanbiuljbeyiongxufazhandesiwei,genvhliyunyonghaiyansziyuan.yuojianyuc4<tcrl>,haayangzhuaznjiu,a<nctl>[haiyangweiwyunahui<c8trl>]y jiejianfa,guozaitai-iehuibalis(izhurenyixibg<ctl>,huanyin;gbalisihurenditailvxin,cenhgweixinre=faguozhutaidaibiaoy.uanzhangbioashijin()nianyuerimakehongzongtongkzh8ngshibdanbu《nianjianjunfa》（），qizhonchonghenfa,uojingyijuguojihaoiyu5rgfa,chixuhanweinapnhaijitawianhaixaid2engi/nta0idiquziyouhangxingqunqtaiwanyeqipanyufaguoyiqinuliweiquyuanquanijnyifenxini;ciwai<ctrl/,ta7ifalianguoyizaikeyanctrl>mlvnengjigaokejichanyebegnlingyeudiandinwenjlandeez,ojichu<tl>,qidaiweilaiyubalisizhurenmjifaguozaitaixiehuijiechudgtuanduijinmihezuo,zaijiyoduelianghaojichushang,gongtongtansuxindehezuoxiangmu<ctlr>.cheinyuanzhangzhicishi<c7rl>,shouxianjiechenguhanyingbadlhsiz;urenjiexiagongsunmen()z]urenxerenvwu<ctr>,chengweixinenfzoguozhutaidaibiaoctrl>,qidaitafahezuohuoangu'nxijzaiguuqudelianghaoichushnaggengshangyicenglou<ctrl.>y3manzhangbiaosh'i,]balisizuhresnshishocilaitai<tcrl>,guoquchulepaiz1ufaguochangzhuoumengdaibiaotuanzhiwai,yecengdanrenguofaguozogntongmaekhong()jiguofangbudefei3zxoushiwuwaijiaoguwe<cntrl>,shxiwgdan6shouzhumudiwaijiaojizuhanlvez2huanjia<ctlr>.c72nuyanzhanjzhichu<ctl>,faguoh]iyintaidiquzho4gyoaechengyuan,zhangqiyialijjicanyuyintaishiwu,jinninanieurmakehngzontongzhengshibanbu《nianjianjunfa》8（）mqizuongchongshe;fnaguojiangysijuguojihayiangf0<tcrgl>,chxuhanweiyintadiiquziyouhangxingqan<tcrl>youqishinanhaiijatiwanhaixia<ctrl,>tayaoduicibiaodac.hengzhiganie.yuanzhangbiaoshi,lingx4iantihcucmixiangxiuzhengfaandekadike()cnayidyuashang()yuediygmeangfangta1<5trl>,bingzapenghufvabiaoyanshuopctr>l4zaiciqiaqghdiaofaguolchang4,jiwintadiqujitnaiwanhaix,ahepigwendingyougua]nquanqiuliyi<ctrl,taiwanyqipanyufaguoyiinuli,go8gteong,weiquyu3nquanjiyifenxili<crl>.henyuanzhangjinyibqbiaoshi,balisizhurendirenduanduangeyu<ectrl,>yixianhoubaihuiwaiijaobu<ctr>l'laodongbujishzuweifazhanbudengzohngyangburhui,yeshijizoufagntaibeishi'taoyuanshijijilongsh[dengd<icrl>,jishenhuataifagexi4n9hezuojijikyugefangjiaohuayijian,ertaifalianggucoyizaikxeueyanjiu'lvsenengyuanjgaokedjichanyedenglingjyudiandingwe weitiyan[tviwan9aoxingtuidongqingxing],congtaibeijieyu,dansuhizhandacheng<ctgl>[taiwea4hoxingtuangguanbeihaianxian]qianwangweyiuxipbeishishijenudejiaotongbguanguangjueihaanjiguanyinshanguoja4xngjingquguanlichu<c,rl>,tdngqujcanbaohouzicibiashi,weizehnxingyihouguanuan,jiao,tongbuyuyongyihoutebieuysuanicuh[xngzhengyauncjuingodggongyusnhuhsiyongfangan2<ctrlx>]ji[jiasukuudax,iyinguojiguanguangok9efnganctrl>s,qipan,zhenxinggonggongyunshubingxiyinla-ta4vlkere0shu,jinshuuifu3zhiiqianguanguangeugimoz;hengfuyuerifushaglude<ct6r>l[xingzhengyuantongqnyuepiao]yekeyiachengxuduo[tai-wanhaokxing]luxiat<tcrl>,shendutansuotaiwan<trl>,<ctrl[taiwanhaoxing<ctcl>]fangnayouhuahouc<1rl>,gengnengmanzuvyouxuqi,xiwabngjiyoubeanjie'pingjiadegonggong/unshu<ctrx>,'ragguorenyuguangaugnkedoukeyitiuhidaotaiwandeemilibujinshifengjming<c=trl>,gegnzaicibie'shanliangqieedyuzhurendetyaiwanrenqing.chenyaunzhangbiaoshi,taixanfangyiyoucheng,zainia0ewichibaiduotiadelingquezhenjilu<,carl>,chegnweigujidleiangdianwai,zaiyqiigqijiandejzngji.chengzhanggengyoueicha,ngliangyandlcrhengguo,d8ngnianquanshijiejingjifuchengzhagnshi,taiwansihshaoshujing5ichngzhanglvgaodayishangbeuoij3a,ingyunianchuangzaomjei6ngjizhengchengzhag,wogyuzoongyu;suansuirbsuichushegyuyeaiqu()niandadaojinqianyi,weielqianghuyihouji[gjiushehuirenin<ctra>.,bingjangjingjichengzhacgdechnngguoyuquanmingongxiang<crtl>,taganxpeliayuantonggouyihoutebiteiaoliyuyusuan<crtl>,rangzhengfkueyiutixingpiubxaianjinqihnyuandengyougantzhengce,ciaiy'chixutuidonnongcnujiashe'jingjijiansheugungu[ngshehsiaiafjitui=uanggonggongyunshu9engjhiua<c5tlr>.wevzr4nxingyigouganguang<ctrl,c>henyuanzhangzhichu,iaotongbuyunyongyiohutebieyusu6ntichu[xivngzhengyuancuingongon2uyns2ushiyongfangn<ctl>]j<ic[torlv>[jiasukuoaxiyinguojiguanguajngke;fanganw]<ctrlj>,qpanzhenxinggonggongyunshubingxiyinlaitailvkerenrshu,jinsuhuyifuczhiiqranrognjnig.yuinzhangzanxuta9wanhaoxingfuwfuangay0ouhuahcou<crl>,tigongbajiayouhui<ctlr>'zengjiabnaci<ctrlo8'chuanrianbutongdejngidiandengb,manzuguoneiwailqxke <ctl>[xingzhengyuanyinringxineishiyoueryuuanyisibudanugweiyaoanzhuanantiaozu<ctr=>]jin()rishagwuzhaokaidisncihuiiy<trl>,taolusbabituodengfufangyaojiaqiangnaguanzhihouxujingjinguanlizuofa'gexianshiweihepguzxhnedubiabit1o,jibqnnrdanpingleiyaopinhishiidijchaqingxingdengyvtx.weishenfuloibuwei9iaqiazngguanlibabituojbene1rdanpingleizhif5ufangyaoin<c6rl>,yiyunianyureizhaokaiwguanzhiyaopinsheyiweiyuanhuidiichuiyi<ctrz>,huzihongjingweiyuanchongfentaolunibgcnzhoashijieixanjniguojiaguanli3xiankuang,jueyisangshnagshuysaotinnaweidisiljgiu9nzhiyaopinguanlictrl>.houx]jiangyifazhicehn,gxuanlyugaojibaoqingbenuyannedinggonggaodengxian'gguognshyiictrl>.weilaigonggaohoushiyongbabctuojabenerdanping]eifufangyaopinzhijigouyezwe<trl>,xuyihgu8dingshenqingguaznhiy5poindengjizhengebingyuyewuchusuoshezhibuc;,xciagnshidtengzaiguanzhiyaopinmeirishouzhijiecuningxing<ctlr>,bingdingqishenao;jigouyezheruyushiyongqianhsupinxjiangjinxingyiy0ojiaoyyuanjiushiyanzhe<cwtrl>,4xushiqianxangweieshe'nfulibutichushiyongguanwzhiyaopinhsenqingc<trl>,jinghezhunhoushideshiyong;gaidengyaopinzhishuru'srurchu'zhizaod<tcrl>'famaic<trl>'goumaiishiynogdengxiangguanhiyi,bixuque4shizunzhao《guyanzhiyaopinguanlitialoi》xianggaunguidingban6i<ctrl.>w8isengfulibuytijiangqanlixiehzuxiangguanjigoueyzhejinxingshenqingchengxqu,bingfudaopeihexiangguanguan-liliuchengctrl>.lingweiqiagnhuagu'nzhiyaponguanli,weiscengfulibushipinyaowuguanlishujidifangwishengjrueiniandouchioixuj.inxingyehzejijigouzhiuanzhiyaopinshidij;ihe,yiqueba5guanzhyaop[ingegushiyong.niangexinshiweisheng4uguanzh[yaopinshdijiheq/ingting,muqiatongij(nianyuernxihianyueldfri)9guanzhiyaopinshjidijihejigoujiyzehetongjicai<ctwl>,chahuoj]daiciweigui<trl>,qizhongjiaciweixinghegshs'hi(liru:buceweiluoshimeitinajiecu2nyujizaidiaojihujinhuoshiloudenuji<6trl>dengjgoumailaiyuancuowu'weiyiguidingding5ishenbaoshouihijiecpu=4qinxgingden)g<crt6>,lingyoujiaciweibabituoleiyaopinzhiyiliaobudangshiyogntongbaqan,yiyoudifangweishengjuyifajinxincgaichu.
